About Us

The History Of Deale Development

We Strive For Greatness


Deale Development was founded by Max Deale in May 2019. After working as a professional sound engineer in Cape Town for 5 years, Max decided that he needed to take his skills and career to the next level, and become a Web desinger and Developer. He Found that he had a real passion for technology, building the web and creating apps and websites that genuinely help peoples lives and businesses.


After completing multiple courses and projects he decided that it was time to start a business - a business that focuses on creating dynamic web apps and websites. Deale Development strives to build the web in a positive way, and help indivduals and businesses across the world.

Reliability

We promise to always deliver your projects as expected and meet your every need.

Communication

We promise to always be available to communicate with our clients, and make sure nothing is lost in translation.

Going the extra mile

We want nothing to be out of our reach, and will take on any project, and make sure it gets done as per the clients needs.
